marklogic.body: How is it possible to feel equal measures of pride, and utter disgust all at the same time? My feelings on this subject are well known, but I suppose it bears repeating: Play a gentleman with a heart; get completely panned, and labeled a brooding emo with no talent for life. Play a psycho on a downward spiral with a penchant for random violence and lots of kinky sex; you're a freaking star and your shrine in the Real Men with Gobs of Acting Talent section already has the candles Burning. Oh Rob, I'm sofa king proud of you and I can't wait to see this movie. I just wish it was as acceptable and celebrated to be as wonderful at being Edward as it is being Eric.
